Court Application for Copy of Driving Record Compliance Dismissal Deferred Disposition Driving Safety Request Municipal Court Procedures Payments Online: www.t rafficpayment.com Payments By Phone: (800) 444-1187 To contact the Talty Municipal Court office, email courtclerk@taltytexas.com or call 972-552-9487. The office will move to its new location on June 3, 2024. Location: Court is also held at Violators have twenty (20) days from the date of the ticket to enter a written plea. The court accepts cash, money orders, credit cards and personal checks with proper identification . Please do not bring your children to court. DO NOT WEAR FLIP/FLOPS, SHORTS OR TANK TOPS AND DRESS RESPECTFULLY. Defendants may contact the court between 8 am and 12 pm, Monday thru Friday to speak with the clerk regarding disposition options set out by the Judge.
Janice McKee Municipal Judge
Nancy Sanford Court Clerk
